<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Purge Sins](/Feats.aspx?ID=2295) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities. For each [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) currently affecting you, attempt a [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) check to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) that disease or poison. As normal, your counteract level is equal to half your level, rounded up.
name: Purge Sins
